"a member of the military in an infantry or amphibious force"

Why are these guys called marines?

Scullyy they called Space Marines

short explanation
Marines who travels around space ships

For more info Google Warhammer 40k it is a war strategy figure board games, that the film is based on

@Skullyy,  uhh maybe because they are based in space-SHIPS, the name is given to troops based on spaceships in countless instances,  troops that are merely transported by spaceships are infantry, those who are a permanant part of the ships complement are marines, same as on seafaring ships for centuries.

In Nomine Imperatoris!
Veneration of the immortal Emperor is what the Ultramarines is built upon in the table top game. That's why this movie is religion-heavy.

I give the movie a 3/5, it definitely is a first time effort by the studio and it shows.  However, the movie itself has potential for sequels and TV show.  It almost comes off as an episode 1 for a tv series more than anything. 

 These guys can make something out of it if they wish, but this is not the 'definitive 40k movie' in the least.

Mostly for 40k fanboys but tolerable to those mildly interested and wanting to kill the time.

As a tabletop player of this game I enjoyed this movie very much.  The computers used to make this were likely hand-me-downs from a larger production company.  The animators were probably novices but still did a great job.  The voice acting was good and the story was compelling.

As a loyal servant of chaos this movie disappointed the hell outa me. there was none of the close range bloodletting that marks warhammer 40k as special. i wanted to see marines clashing, fighting and finally dying after they have been torn apart. bolters are bad ass but it takes more than a bolter round or two to drop a space marine. these guys fought like guardsmen. plus scouts should be in scout armor. this would have been a better movie if they were scouts. they were way to green for power armor.

i'm glad games workshop is getting into the movie business finally, but still, these guys fought and died like guardsmen. not space marines.

audio shoulda been better. music was great, sounds of battle seemed to be lacking.

Stay vigilant my brothers
This movie is fucking terrible! Don't waste your time.

This was a good movie I think for a small budgeted studio. Better story than anything hollywood would throw up.  The plot was simple but enough to give fanboys something. I think this can be a series or give way to more improved and better movies. But if we just pirate it it won't help them. I bought the dvd box, its not expensive. If you're a loyal 40k fan, buy it so they can do more.
Also Space Marines > Starcraft pussy marines.
